issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

fields.summary: MiniDFSCluster to support being built on randomized base directory

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

fields.summary: Fix broken unit tests on Windows

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

issuetype.description: A new unit, integration or system test.
issuetype.name: Test

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description:
breakHardlinks() of ReplicaInfo(branch-2)/LocalReplica(trunk) replaces file while the source is still opened as input stream, which will fail and throw exception on Windows. It's the cause of  unit test case org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.TestFileAppend#testBreakHardlinksIfNeeded failure on Windows.

Other test cases of TestFileAppend fail randomly on Windows due to sharing the same test folder, and the solution is using randomized base dir of MiniDFSCluster via HDFS-13408
fields.summary: Bug fix for breakHardlinks() of ReplicaInfo/LocalReplica, and fix TestFileAppend failures on Windows

Do you mind posting the verson for trunk,Yetus is not working for branch-2.

Thanks [~elgoiri] for reviewing.

Sure, just added [^HDFS-13509.000.patch] for trunk.

[~surmountian], can you confirm that TestBlockReaderLocal is not related?
LocalReplica seems somewhat related.

I checked the code, org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.server.datanode.LocalReplica#breakHardlinks won't be called by the failed case +[TestBlockReaderLocal.testStatisticsForErasureCodingRead|https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-HDFS-Build/24097/testReport/org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.client.impl/TestBlockReaderLocal/testStatisticsForErasureCodingRead/],+ actually it's been failing for a while, so should not be caused by this patch.
Thanks [~surmountian], let's see if Yetus comes without that error this time.

Committed to trunk, branch-3.1, branch-3.0, branch-2, and branch-2.9.
